00009 unsigned char output_str[20];
00010 unsigned char str_len=0;

00012 void output_show_display(unsigned char index) {
00013         if (index == 0) {
00014                 lcdPrintData("  PowerMeter v1.0",17);
00015                 lcdGotoXY(0,1);
00016                 lcdPrintData("     by SM2WMV",14);
00017         }
00018         else if (index == 1) {
00019                 lcdClear();
00020                 lcdGotoXY(0,0);
00021                 
00022                 sprintf(output_str,"FWD: %iW",status.curr_fwd_power);
00023                 str_len = strlen(output_str);
00024                                         
00025                 lcdPrintData(output_str,str_len);
00026                 
00027                 lcdGotoXY(12,0);
00028                 sprintf(output_str,"SWR:%1.2f",input_calculate_vswr());
00029                 str_len = strlen(output_str);
00030                 lcdPrintData(output_str,str_len);
00031                 
00032                 lcdGotoXY(0,1);
00033                 lcdProgressBar(status.curr_fwd_power,current_coupler.power_limit,20);
00034         }
00035         else if (index == 2) {
00036                 lcdClear();
00037                 lcdGotoXY(0,0);
00038                 
00039                 sprintf(output_str,"FWD: %iW",status.curr_fwd_power);
00040                 str_len = strlen(output_str);
00041                                         
00042                 lcdPrintData(output_str,str_len);
00043                 
00044                 lcdGotoXY(12,0);
00045                 sprintf(output_str,"SWR:%1.2f",input_calculate_vswr());
00046                 str_len = strlen(output_str);
00047                 lcdPrintData(output_str,str_len);
00048                 
00049                 lcdGotoXY(0,1); 
00050                 sprintf(output_str,"REF: %iW",status.curr_ref_power);
00051                 str_len = strlen(output_str);
00052                                         
00053                 lcdPrintData(output_str,str_len);
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 void output_update_leds(void) {
00058         if (settings.bargraph_mode == BARGRAPH_MODE_RMS) {
00059                 led_set_fwd(((float)(status.curr_fwd_power) / (float)(settings.led_fwd_power_high))*15);
00060                 led_set_ref(((float)(status.curr_ref_power) / (float)(settings.led_ref_power_high))*7);
00061         }
00062         
00063         if ((status.curr_vswr*100) >= settings.vswr_warn_limit) {
00064                 led_set_vswr_state(LED_STATE_ON);
00065         }
00066 }
